entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -28.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -32.1°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
